cobblemon.species.aphelis.name: Aphelis
cobblemon.species.aphelis.desc: Known as proud guardians of the skies, Aphelis rarely form bonds with humans. They are fiercely protective, often intervening to save other and any Pokémon from the clutches of poachers.
cobblemon.species.apheos.name: Apheos
cobblemon.species.apheos.desc: Driven by a burning ambition, Apheos strives to be a guardian like its evolution. However, its small stature and lack of power often lead it to take on challenges it cannot yet overcome.
cobblemon.species.flammiko.name: Flammiko
cobblemon.species.flammiko.desc: Always lost and never able to stand correctly, scientists have yet to discover the miracle behind this species' survival. Despite having very few thoughts, Flammiko are incredibly friendly and will do anything to protect their friends.
cobblemon.species.galama.name: Galama
cobblemon.species.galama.desc: Often mistaken for a simple rock formation, Galama is a remarkably calm Pokémon that possesses a thick, carapace-like plate on its head. This natural helmet is nearly indestructible, allowing Galama to ignore most threats while it rests. It is so relaxed that smaller Pokémon are often seen napping in the shade provided by its metallic head-shell.
cobblemon.species.rineshell.name: Rineshell
cobblemon.species.rineshell.desc: Though its metallic shell is not yet fully formed, Rineshell possesses a stubborn spirit, never backing down from a challenge. It dreams of the day its headplate will be strong enough to withstand any blow without it having to move a muscle.
cobblemon.species.bayleef-rlm.desc: Far more territorial than its Johto counterpart, this Bayleef is a master of ambush. It hides in dense shrubbery to launch surprise attacks on any foes that dare enter its domain.
cobblemon.species.blastoise-rlm.desc: Adapted for aerial mobility, this variant uses its massive cannons as jet thrusters. It launches into the air with explosive force, becoming a living projectile. Once airborne, it displays surprising grace, navigating the winds by tilting its ears and tail to reach far-off territories.
cobblemon.species.empoleon-rlm.desc: Usually a calm Pokémon, the wrath of this Empoleon is unbearable. It creates torrents of electricity from its horns and summons massive waves to submerge its prey. Due to its destructive power, it is deeply feared by other wild Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.prinplup-rlm.desc: Highly irritable and prideful, this Prinplup seeks out lightning storms to recharge its wings. It is a reckless fighter, emitting high-voltage sparks that paralyze any foe who touches its metallic feathers.
item.desc.flammikite: Allows Flammiko to Mega Evolve into Mega Flammiko.
cobblemon.move.electrosiphon.desc: If the opposing Pokémon survives, the user gains a 2-stage boost to Special Attack.
cobblemon.move.highpropulsion.desc: A strike of exceptional speed. Priority +1. The user will suffer recoil.
cobblemon.ability.dragonlate.desc: Its draconic skin turns Normal-type moves into Dragon-type moves.
cobblemon.ability.dullnessguard.desc: A mysterious power protects the Pokémon from all moves, except for those that are « not very effective ».
cobblemon.ability.psychoprio.desc: The user of this ability has priority on all of its attacks as long as it has more than 50% of its HP.
